oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Barber - Underwood_009
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: January 24 [1890] unsigned letter addressed to Dear Children in an envelope postmarked Kansas, addressed to George F. Barber, Knoxville, TN. AL 3 pp. + envelope. Re: illness and death of father and settling his affairs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Families; Death & burial;
